item0.name: Doran's Blade
item0.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item1.name: Refillable Potion
item1.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

item2.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item2.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
12% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15% Life Steal for 8s (90s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

item5.name: Lord Dominik's Regards
item5.description:
35 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
35% Armor Penetration
  • Giant Slayer: Deal up to 15% bonus physical damage against champions with greater max Health than you.

    Max damage increase reached when Health difference is greater than 2000.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Doran's Blade
item0.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item2.name: Plated Steelcaps
item2.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item3.name: The Collector
item3.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
12 Lethality
  • Death and Taxes: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health executes them. Champion kills grant an additional 25 gold.

item4.name: Executioner's Calling
item4.description:
15 Attack Damage
  • Rend: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

item0.name: Death's Dance
item0.description:
50 Attack Damage
40 Armor
15 Ability Haste
  • Ignore Pain: 35% (15% for Ranged users) of physical damage taken is dealt to you over 3 seconds instead.
  • Defy: Champion takedowns cleanse Ignore Pain's remaining damage pool, grant you 30% Move Speed for 2 seconds and restore 10% of max Health over the duration.

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Mercury's Treads
item3.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

perk0.name: Dark Harvest
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Doran's Blade
item0.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item1.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item1.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
12% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15% Life Steal for 8s (90s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

item2.name: Last Whisper
item2.description:
20 Attack Damage
20% Armor Penetration

item4.name: Plated Steelcaps
item4.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

item2.name: Noonquiver
item2.description:
30 Attack Damage
15% Attack Speed
  • Precision: Attacks deal an additional 20 physical damage to Minions and Monsters.

item3.name: Plated Steelcaps
item3.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item4.name: Control Ward
item4.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Infinity Edge
item0.description:
70 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
  • Perfection: If you have at least 60% Critical Strike Chance, gain 35% Critical Strike Damage.

item1.name: Quicksilver Sash
item1.description:
30 Magic Resist

Active - Quicksilver: Removes all crowd control debuffs (excluding Airborne) (90s cooldown).

item2.name: The Collector
item2.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
12 Lethality
  • Death and Taxes: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health executes them. Champion kills grant an additional 25 gold.
